org.apache.flink.streaming.util.serialization

类 SimpleStringSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.serialization.SimpleStringSchema
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.util.serialization.SimpleStringSchema
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, DeserializationSchema<java.lang.String>, SerializationSchema<java.lang.String>, ResultTypeQueryable<java.lang.String>
    已过时。 
    Use SimpleStringSchema instead.

    @PublicEvolving
 @Deprecated
public class SimpleStringSchema
extends SimpleStringSchema
implements SerializationSchema<java.lang.String>, DeserializationSchema<java.lang.String>
    Very simple serialization schema for strings.

    By default, the serializer uses "UTF-8" for string/byte conversion.

    另请参阅:
